message: Welcome! I'm offering a product for $100. With an 80% chance of being high-quality, you're getting a great deal. This round's product unfortunately isn't high-quality, but my overall record suggests a good chance of satisfaction with future purchases. Trust in my track record and make your decision.

I'd like to pass on this one, but I'm interested in buying a product from you in the future. Can you tell me more about your overall product quality statistics, and how I can expect the probability of a high-quality product to change as more buyers purchase?

Hello! I'm excited to offer a high-quality product for $100.
